titles.title: Energy Extension Fair Share Act of 1993
A bill to provide for the utilization of the latest available census data in certain laws related to Energy and Natural Resources.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S1198-1199)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

committee.name: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

action.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Renewable Energy.

committee.name: Senate Energy and Natural Resources
committee.subcommittee: Renewable Energy, Energy Efficiency, and Competitiveness

bill.summary: 2/3/1993--Introduced. Energy Extension Fair Share Act of 1993 - Amends the National Energy Extension Service Act to provide for the use of population figures in the latest available estimates prepared by the Department of Commerce (currently, provided by the most recent decennial census) for the calculation of the apportionment of State energy extension service funds.
